(Actually I dont think the pod ever took off.)
--- cyberwolf4@... wrote:
> Lunarpines transport pod lands at the edge of the
> battlefield 
> Lunarpine leaps out as it makes contact with the
> ground. taking cover 
> he selects his target and selects concussion setting
> on his pulse 
> rifle, he takes aim at Serpentor firing three shots.
> 
>  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > (TY KSLawdogg.)
> > 
> > ::Shadow Wing::
> > 
> > She turned the corner and ran onto the bridge just
> as the bomb went 
> > off.  She was thrown back across the hall and hit
> the wall with 
> full 
> > force from the explosion.  She falls to the floor
> covered in 
> shrapnel 
> > cuts. She coughs and gets up on her knees,
> recovering from the 
> > explosion.
>
